thread.title: Justin Timberlake Loves Wife Jessica Biel’s Oscars Dress: ‘I Call It Perfection’
thread.title_full: Justin Timberlake Loves Wife Jessica Biel’s Oscars Dress: ‘I Call It Perfection’

author: Karen Mizoguchi
title: Justin Timberlake Loves Wife Jessica Biel’s Oscars Dress: ‘I Call It Perfection’
text:
Justin Timberlake can’t stop his feelings about wife Jessica Biel ‘s Oscars gown. 
“I call it perfection,” the Oscar-nominated songwriter told E!’s Ryan Seacreat of Biel’s glittery KaufmanFranco gown and Tiffany & Co. diamonds. 
And Timberlake wasn’t looking too shabby himself. 
The father of one was dapper in a Tom Ford tuxedo and color-coordinated bow tie along with a fresh haircut. 
David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock A post shared by KAUFMANFRANCO (@kaufmanfranco) on Feb 26, 2017 at 4:05pm PST I want to thank everyone from the parts department to the folks on the assembly line for putting this package together. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/9Ijlv1Q9ks 
— Jessica Biel (@JessicaBiel) February 27, 2017 
Watch the PEOPLE& EW Red Carpet Live Oscars pre-show on Feb. 26 at 5 p.m. ET/2 p.m. PT on the People/Entertainment Weekly Network (PEN). Go to PEOPLE.com/PEN, or download the app on your favorite device. Then watch our Red Carpet Fashion Wrap-Up after the Oscars! 
Keep your ears and eyes open at the top of the Jimmy Kimmel-hosted telecast as Timberlake is slated to kick off the show. The actor will perform “Can’t Stop the Feeling” from Trolls. 
Check out PEOPLE’s full 2017 Academy Awards coverage and complete winners list ! 
“S tay watching … have champagne already poured,” he teased. Show Full Article
